description:
A few hours or multiple days, running or hiking – you move through adventure at your own pace. Inspired by runners, then refined to offer the versatility to handle a wide range of high output mountain activities, the Cormac is designed for performance and comfort. Its lightweight gridded fabric feels great, breathes, wicks moisture, and dries fast. The fit maximizes airflow and moves with your body, and the clean design delivers a look that make it great for daily wear.

Updated fit and patterning improve airflow.
name: Arcteryx Cormac Crew SS - Mens
